thread.title: 12 of James Bond's funniest and most memorable one-liners
thread.title_full: 12 of James Bond's funniest and most memorable one-liners

title: 12 of James Bond's funniest and most memorable one-liners
text:
12 of James Bond's funniest and most memorable one-liners 12 of James Bond's funniest and most memorable one-liners 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
James Bond may have his licence to kill, but the ruthless secret agent also has a sense of humour, albeit of the gallows kind at times. 
Sean Connery, the first actor to play 007 on the big screen, uttered some of the most memorable lines in the franchise’s history. 
But he was swiftly followed by the likes of Roger Moore and Pierce Brosnan, who also demonstrated a deft touch with groan-inducing dialogue. Here are 11 of the most memorable one-liners uttered by Commander James Bond. 1. Goldfinger 
Pussy Galore: “My name is Pussy Galore.” Bond: “I must be dreaming.” 2. Goldfinger 
[after electrocuting a bad guy] Bond: “Shocking. Positively shocking.” 
Xenia Onatopp: “You don’t need the gun.” Bond: “Well, that depends on your definition of safe sex.” 4. GoldenEye 
Jack Wade: “Jack Wade, CIA.” Bond: “James Bond, stiff-ass Brit.” 5. Tomorrow Never Dies 
Bond: “I always enjoyed learning a new tongue.” 6. The World is Not Enough 
Bond: “I was wrong about you.” Christmas Jones: “Yeah, how so?” Bond: “I thought Christmas only comes once a year.” 7. The Man with the Golden Gun Roger Moore as James Bond (PA) 
Bond: “Miss Anders! I didn’t recognise you with your clothes on.” 8. Dr No 
Honey Ryder: “Are you looking for shells too?” Bond: “No, I’m just looking.” 9. Thunderball 
[After shooting Vargas with a spear gun] Bond: “I think he got the point.” 10. The Spy Who Loved Me 
Sir Frederick Gray: “Bond! What do you think you’re doing?” Bond: “Keeping the British end up, sir.” 11. Live and Let Die 
[after Kananga imbibes an air capsule and blows up like a balloon] Bond: “He always did have an inflated opinion of himself.” Share article 
Raoul Silva: “Well, first time for everything.” Bond: “What makes you think this is my first time?” Promoted Stories
